name: Fidget Spinner - Relaxing Toy
description:
This fidget spinner-relaxing toy will help you to free yourself from stress. It will make you feel relaxed. Just swipe to play and spin the fidget spinner. Swipe your finger as hard as you can to get high speed. It is a toy for adults and children to spend time. You only need to spin this cool fidget hand spinner. Fidget spinner is also known as hand spinner and fidget cube game.

Feautres

Awesome fidget spinner.
Real Physics based Simulation
Real physics based sound effect

Just use your finger to spin the fidget spinner! Have fun and relax!

Also known as in other countries: hand Spinnköder spinner à main, hilandero manual, finger spinner, hand spinner, fidget cube etc.
